channel.title: Item equipping error [PI]
channel.description:
[code] [2/4/11 8:27 AM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [2/4/11 8:27 AM]: at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.wearItem(ItemAssistant.java:1173) [2/4/11 8:27 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.WearItem.processPacket(WearItem.java:36) [2/4/11 8:27 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:138) [2/4/11 8:27 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:827) [2/4/11 8:27 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:148) [2/4/11 8:27 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:149) [/code]
Heres my itemAssistant class [url=http://pastebin.com/MneJ8t4j]http://pastebin.com/MneJ8t4j[/url]
I've got 602 items, most items work. Just not all. For example my fighter torso gives me the error above.
Please help.

item.title: Item equipping error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

abatssk8ter:

When you equip them it gives you that error? Does the error do anything? like crash the server?

When i TRY to equip the item I get that error, it doesnt equip. The error doesnt do anything.

Read full topic
